articles.title: Pluto is alive! Scientists confirm volcanoes of ice, not seen anywhere in solar system, erupting on surface - India Today
articles.description: 16 years after it was removed as a planet, Pluto still remains mysteriously intriguing. Scientists have now found volcanoes of ice are erupting on the surface.

articles.title: OnePlus 9 Pro is on sale for less than Rs 60,000, should you buy it or wait for OnePlus 10 Pro? - India Today
articles.description: The OnePlus 9 Pro is still a pretty good 5G smartphone that you can buy in 2022. The device is available at a discounted price on Amazon, just ahead of the OnePlus 10 Pro India launch, which will take place on March 31.

articles.title: Lakhimpur Kheri case: SC pulls up UP govt for not cancelling Ashish Misra’s bail - India Today
articles.description: The Supreme Court has pulled up the Uttar Pradesh administration for not cancelling Union minister Ajay Misra's son Ashish Misra's bail as per the recommendation of the special investigation team probing the Lakhimpur Kheri violence case.
